Class InlineScrollPanel

java.lang.Object
  java.awt.Component
      java.awt.Container
          javax.swing.JComponent
              javax.swing.JPanel
                  se.vxu.msi.malteval.treeviewer.piccolo.inlinescrollview.InlineScrollPanel
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible
public class InlineScrollPanel
extends javax.swing.JPanel

the GUI container class composed of an arrow panel and a button panel for the editMode1. Manage everything by delegating most tasks to the inner components.

See Also:
